袙字的基本解释

袙
pà
古同“耙”（ａ．帐子；ｂ．头巾，如“秦雄诸侯，乃加其武将首饰为绛袙，以表贵贱。”）。

袙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pà］
［《集韻》普駕切，去禡，滂。］
(1)束发头巾。
(2)指用头巾缠裹。
[②]［mò］
同“袹1”。

袙字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　袙； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1114第21
【集韻】普駕切，音怕。【類篇】帳也。【篇海】同帕、帊。別詳巾部。　又【篇海】莫八切，音㑻。帕額，首飾。【後漢·輿服志】秦雄諸侯，乃加其武將首飾爲絳袙，以表貴賤。

袙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
袙字的起名意思

暂无。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
pà
In ancient times, the "rake" (a. tent; b. headscarf, such as "Qin Xiong princes, add his military commander jewelry as crimson, to show noble and inferior.").
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pà］
["Ji Yun" general drive cut, go to 禡, 滂. ]
(1) Hair turban.
(2) Refers to wrapped in a headscarf.
[②]［mò］
Same as "袹1".
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　袙; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1114 Page 21
[Jiyun] General driving, fear of sound. 【Classes】Accounts too. 【Pianhai】Same as Pa and 帊. Don't detail the towel department.　[Pianhai] Mo eight cut, sound 㑻. Pae, jewelry. [Later Han·Yufuzhi] Qin Xiong princes, add his military commander jewelry as a crimson, to show the noble and inferior.
